definition: to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: Vitamin C is destroyed when overheated.
sentences.chinese: 维生素C受热过度就会被破坏。

sentences.english: It shields oil from spoilage-inducing heat and oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 它保护油不受热和氧气的影响而变质。

sentences.english: Inside heating surface of tube is clean.
sentences.chinese: 受热面管子内表面洁净无垢。

sentences.english: Land, just like the sand, warms up more quickly than water but it also loses its heat more quickly.
sentences.chinese: 土地，就像沙子一样，比水受热快，但失热也快。

sentences.english: Avoid exposing to heat and moisture, screw down the aluminium lid, use immediately after opening up.
sentences.chinese: 本品避免受热受潮，请拧紧铝盖，打开后及时使用。

sentences.english: The deposit on the heating surface of LTE can be cleaned away by a special mechanical ash-remover at any time.
sentences.chinese: 特制的机械清灰装置可随时除去受热面的积灰。

sentences.english: But he was the most talked-about feature of the conference.
sentences.chinese: 但他是这次大会最受热议的嘉宾。

sentences.english: Heated, water will change into vapor.
sentences.chinese: 水如受热，就会液体变气体。

sentences.english: Wind is caused by the uneven heating of Earth and its atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 风，由地球及其四周大气的受热不平均惹起。

sentences.english: As has been pointed out in Chapter 5 , the molecules move faster when they are heated .
sentences.chinese: 正如在第五章所指出的那样，分子受热时运动加快。

sentences.english: Besides, the jacket is made of flexible plastic which is unshrinking after being heated.
sentences.chinese: 护套采用受热后不收缩的软塑料制成。

sentences.english: Mercury is filtered out, and water heated by the cooling process then piped away.
sentences.chinese: 汞被过滤后，受热的水则通过管道输走。

sentences.english: Its main heat exchange function is realized by heating surface arranged in rotors.
sentences.chinese: 它的主要换热作用由布置在转子中的受热面来完成。

sentences.english: On the contrary, if when the hydrocarbon yielding is known, it is possible to deduce the heating history it experienced.
sentences.chinese: 反过来，若已知镜质体的生烃率，应可反推其受热史。

sentences.english: This paper presents a vibration reliability analysis method of boiler economizers and tubular airheaters.
sentences.chinese: 提出了锅炉尾部受热面的振动可靠性分析方法。
